task_summary: Unfold a wrinkled towel placed on a table using a bimanual robot.

task_long_description.overview: This episode depicts a bimanual robot tasked with locating, grasping, and sequentially unfolding a soft pink towel arranged with visible wrinkles on a green mat. The scene involves repeated bi-manual grasps and lateral stretches to flatten and unfold the towel. The system must handle compliant object manipulation and maintain stability during each phase.
preconditions: Towel is placed on the workspace, initially wrinkled.
Robot arms are at a safe starting position.
stepwise_plan: Detect the towel and estimate its pose.
Compute the first grasp pose using the top strategy.
Grasp an edge or corner of the towel.
Move the grasped corner outward along the x-axis to begin unfolding.
Release the towel by opening the gripper.
Recompute grasp on the opposite wrinkled region.
Pull outward again to complete the unfolding.
Release once the towel is flat.
success_criteria: Towel surface is flat and mostly free of folds.
failure_and_recovery: If the towel is not detected, reacquire via perception.
If the grasp fails, recompute and retry.
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the system detects the towel is flat and unfolded, or all plan steps are executed.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Detects and localizes the towel in the workspace.
Computes grasp pose for the towel (first grasp).
Executes a top grasp at the computed pose (first).
Pulls the towel along the x-axis to unfold.
Opens the gripper to release the towel.
Computes grasp pose for the towel (second grasp).
Executes a top grasp at the computed pose (second).
Pulls second edge of the towel outward to finalize unfolding.
Opens the gripper to complete the task and release the towel.

failure_modes: Insufficient movement to unfold the towel.
recovery_strategy: Retry perception if towel is not detected.
Re-compute grasp pose and retry grasp.
assumptions: The manipulation sequence is fully aligned with frame observations.
No explicit force/tolerance values inferred from images.
Symbolic pose keys (towel_grasp_1, towel_grasp_2) represent corners/edges seen wrinkled in frames.
Objects referenced (towel) are visible in all critical steps.

expected_success_criteria: Towel appears flat and unfolded as seen in final frames.
